SALESFORCE HELP
DOCS
COMMERCE MARKETPLACE
Patch Notes for Commerce Marketplace Winter’ 23

Several patch releases are available for updating the existing Commerce Marketplace. All patches contain fixes that are automatically upgraded. Each patch release is also cumulative, and contains all the fixes from previous Commerce Marketplace Winter ’23 patches. You don't need to complete any previous upgrade steps to install this particular patch build.

TIP
Use the URL link https://yoursite.my.salesforce.com/packaging/installPackage.apexp?p0=codPackage to update your Commerce Marketplace. Substitute “yoursite” for your Salesforce instance and add the code of the package sent to you to the end of the link.
On the Update Commerce Marketplace page, select Install for Admins Only.
Check the box to acknowledge the installation process.
Click Update.
2.51—October 31, 2022

Sandbox org URL: https://yoursite.my.salesforce.com/packaging/installPackage.apexp?p0=04t4R000001ZAygQAG

ID	FIX
W-11318947	Created ‘Commerce Marketplace - Canceled Items’ flow that replaces the canceled item backend process. And updated ‘Commerce Marketplace - Order Canceled by Seller’ to reference the new flow.
W-11808819	Added “Deprecated” to the label of the Import Data button. Removed the Import Data button on Product, Product_Variant, Manufacturer, and Category objects from the List View.
W-11809167	Added Approval Status and Record Type information in list views and records.
W-11809374	Renamed the label of the deprecated field to “Seller Accepts Marketplace Shipping.”
W-11903050	Sorted alphabetically the double-boxed lists in the Category Attribute Configuration component.
W-11908858	Adjusted the login menu layout to prevent having items on the same line.
2.51—November 4, 2022

Sandbox org URL: https://yoursite.my.salesforce.com/packaging/installPackage.apexp?p0=04t4R000001ZAygQAG

ID	FIX
W-11937872	Changed the methods, inputs, and outputs of the SelfRegistrationUserHandlerNew class from “public “to “global”.
2.49—October 6, 2022

Sandbox org URL: https://yoursite.my.salesforce.com/packaging/installPackage.apexp?p0=04t4R000001higyQAA

ID	FIX
W-10929116	Added a description and help text to all custom object fields in the marketplace.
W-11797901	Added the permission for the seller to create a shipping method in the Seller Center.
W-11825336	Changed the lookup filters from "record type ID" to "record type developer name" on the objects Product and Product Match Suggestion.
W-11854183	Changed the Shipment after Patch hook so that it uses the shipping method ID from Business Manager.
2.49—October 10, 2022

Sandbox org URL: https://yoursite.my.salesforce.com/packaging/installPackage.apexp?p0=04t4R000001higyQAA

ID	FIX
W-11507329	Added the Marketplace Administrator license and Seller license.
2.48—October 3, 2022

Sandbox org URL: https://yoursite.my.salesforce.com/packaging/installPackage.apexp?p0=04t4R000001higeQAA

ID	FIX
W-11009930	Divided the specification of the Category Attributes Configuration into Product and Product Variant (SKU) specifications. Added a box where it’s possible to select variation attributes that can't be selected on the SKU specification.
W-11644891	Removed automatic and not required filing from CVS template.
W-11365013	Changed the Apex class so that it processes just the managed package object by verifying the namespace.
W-11823522	Corrected buttons that redirect to the import component in the onboarding process.
W-11802145	Double assignment to a flow is no longer possible, and now only valid cloned products are assigned to a category.
2.48—October 4, 2022

Sandbox org URL: https://yoursite.my.salesforce.com/packaging/installPackage.apexp?p0=04t4R000001higeQAA

ID	FIX
W-11612152	Removed the permission for Marketplace add-on components from the main managed package default permission. Created permission sets for add-ons.
W-11780416	Renamed the New Dash Seller dashboard to Seller Dashboard. The Dash Marketplace dashboard is now named Marketplace Dashboard. The dashboard Folder changed from Marketplace to Commerce Marketplace, and the Report Folders changed from Atonit to Commerce Marketplace.
W-11797953	Added the correct permissions to the permission sets to use reports and dashboards.
W-11797932	Added permissions to approve Category Suggestions to Operator Permission set.
W-11798543	Changed the order of update in the match suggestion approval, and removed an unnecessary condition in a step of the product match Apex class.
DID THIS ARTICLE SOLVE YOUR ISSUE?
Let us know so we can improve!
Yes
No
title: Patch Notes for Salesforce Commerce Marketplace
